A collection of data visualizations I have built for fun using the [R](https://www.r-project.org/about.html) programming language. All visualizations are produced via code without post-processing.
<br/>

The examples source data from the weekly [R4DS #TidyTuesday](https://github.com/rfordatascience/tidytuesday) project, which provides a community for R and tidyverse enthusisasts to practice and share ideas in wrangling, exploring and visualizing data.
